Hi, here is the link for my game if you would like to try it out. https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/d_xqngu9au2uao5atyxgqa/murder-on-the-high-seas
It has not been fully tested so I'm sorry if there are any problems with it. Feel free to ask if you have any questions because it is my first game so it probably has a few clarity issues as well. Other than that please enjoy it! :)
